Malice/ Necross/ Splattercannon:

Malice felt his face plates turn a little red and he slid off the 
table and stood up straight.
"Uh, no.  I have orders from Unicron as soon as the others show up."
Necross strolled in, with Splattercannon not too far behind.
"Unicron wants us to destroy a cannon down on the planet.  Hellplague 
will take Dark Fate and the Sweeps in first, and if it is needed, I 
will lead the rest of us down there to back her up."
Necross was outraged.  How could this upstart lead him?
"What?  Are you saying that Unicron places more faith in a slag heap 
like you!?!  You just got here, in fact, you aren't really a minion, 
are you?  Your just a toy, I won't follow you!" Necross exclaimed, 
slamming his fists into a table.
Splattercannon remained silent, but looked down at Malice with 
contempt.
